description:
As a user
  I want to add a new task
  So that I can track things I need to do

elements.name: Successfully add a valid task

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I enter "Buy groceries" in the task input field
I click the add button
I should see "Buy groceries" in the task list

elements.name: Cannot add an empty task

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I leave the task input field empty
I click the add button
I should see an error message "Task cannot be empty"
the task should not be added to the list

elements.name: Cannot add a task exceeding character limit

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I enter a task with 129 characters
I click the add button
I should see an error message "Task must be 128 characters or less"
the task should not be added to the list

elements.name: Cannot add a task exceeding character limit

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I enter a task with 150 characters
I click the add button
I should see an error message "Task must be 128 characters or less"
the task should not be added to the list

elements.name: Cannot add a task exceeding character limit

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I enter a task with 200 characters
I click the add button
I should see an error message "Task must be 128 characters or less"
the task should not be added to the list

elements.name: Successfully add a task at maximum length

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I enter a task with exactly 128 characters
I click the add button
the task should be added to the list

elements.name: Add multiple tasks

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I add a task "Task 1"
I add a task "Task 2"
I add a task "Task 3"
I should see 3 tasks in the list
the tasks should be displayed in the order they were added

name: Add Task

description:
As a user
  I want to mark tasks as complete or incomplete
  So that I can track my progress

elements.name: Mark an incomplete task as complete

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have a task "Write documentation"
the task is incomplete
I click the checkbox for "Write documentation"
the task should be marked as complete
the task text should be grayed out

elements.name: Mark a complete task as incomplete

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have a task "Review code"
the task is marked as complete
I click the checkbox for "Review code"
the task should be marked as incomplete
the task text should not be grayed out

elements.name: Toggle task completion multiple times

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have a task "Test feature"
I click the checkbox for "Test feature"
the task should be marked as complete
I click the checkbox for "Test feature" again
the task should be marked as incomplete
I click the checkbox for "Test feature" again
the task should be marked as complete

elements.name: Visual appearance of completed task

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have an incomplete task "Deploy application"
I mark the task as complete
the task text should have a grayed out appearance
the checkbox should be checked

name: Complete Task

description:
As a user
  I want to delete tasks
  So that I can remove tasks I no longer need

elements.name: Delete an incomplete task

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have a task "Old task"
I click the delete button for "Old task"
the task "Old task" should be removed from the list

elements.name: Delete a completed task

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have a completed task "Finished work"
I click the delete button for "Finished work"
the task "Finished work" should be removed from the list

elements.name: Delete a task from multiple tasks

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have the following tasks:
I delete "Second task"
I should see 2 tasks in the list
"Second task" should not be in the list
"First task" should still be in the list
"Third task" should still be in the list

elements.name: Delete all tasks one by one

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have 3 tasks
I delete all tasks one by one
the task list should be empty
I should see "No tasks available" message

name: Delete Task

description:
As a user
  I want to see my task list
  So that I can view all my tasks

elements.name: Display empty task list

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have no tasks
I should see "No tasks available" message

elements.name: Display single task

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I add a task "My first task"
I should see 1 task in the list
the task "My first task" should be displayed

elements.name: Display multiple tasks in order

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I add the following tasks in order:
I should see 3 tasks in the list
the tasks should be displayed in this order:

elements.name: Display tasks with different completion states

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have the following tasks:
I should see 3 tasks in the list
"Completed one" should appear grayed out
"Incomplete one" should not appear grayed out
"Another pending" should not appear grayed out

elements.name: Task list updates after adding a task

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have 2 tasks
I add a new task "New task"
I should see 3 tasks in the list
"New task" should be the last task in the list

elements.name: Task list updates after deleting a task

steps.name: I am on the TODO app page
I have 3 tasks
I delete the second task
I should see 2 tasks in the list

name: Display Tasks
